flawed_nl_solution:
The canvases cost $40 and she spent half that amount on paint so she spent 40/2 = $<<40/2=20>>20 on paint
She spent $40 on canvases, $20 on paint and $15 on an easel so she spent 40+20+15 = $<<40+20+15=74>>74
She spent $90 total and her other purchases totaled $74 so she spent 90-74 = $<<90-74=16>>16 on paint brushes
#### 16

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 75, not 74. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
